Spells-Cleric — Male Human Cleric: 10
Strength: 15 (2) Dexterity: 10 (0) Constitution: 15 (2) Intelligence: 19 (4) Wisdom: 12 (1) Charisma: 12 (1)
Background: Urchin Alignment: Lawful Evil Deity: Norse-Forseti (N)
Experience: 66812/85000 Level: 10 Size: Medium Speed: 30 Carry/Lift: 225/450
Ability Notes: Human Ability Adjustment: +1 Charisma/+1 Constitution/+1 Dexterity/+1 Intelligence/+1 Strength/+1 Wisdom
Features/Skills
Proficiency Bonus: 4
Feat Count: General: 2 Selectable Feature Count: Cleric (Divine Domain): 1; Fighter (Maneuver): 2
Feats: Magic Initiate (Warlock); Martial Adept Human Features: Human Ability Adjustment; Language (Common; Choose 1 from any) Fighter Features: Evasive Footwork; Maneuvering Attack Cleric Features: Armor Proficiency (Light; Medium; Shield); Bonus Cantrip (Light Domain); Channel Divinity; Destroy Undead; Divine Domain; Divine Intervention; Improved Flare; Light Domain; Potent Spellcasting; Radiance Of The Dawn; Save Proficiency (Wisdom; Charisma); Skill Proficiency (Choose 2 from History, Insight, Medicine, Persuasion, Religion); Spellcasting; Turn Undead; Warding Flare; Weapon Proficiency (Simple Weapons) Urchin Features: City Secrets; Skill Proficiency (Sleight Of Hand; Stealth); Tool Proficiency (Disguise Kit; Thieves' Tools)
Feature Notes:
Divine Domain: 1 selection
Channel Divinity: Can use a Channel Divinity effect 2 times per short rest
City Secrets: Can travel through a city at twice normal speed
Skill Proficiency: History; Insight; Sleight Of Hand; Stealth

Combat
Hit Points: 58 Initiative: 0 Armor Class: 12 Attacks Per Round: 1
Armor Proficiency: Light; Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Simple Weapons
Armor: Hide Shield: None Weapons: Club (+6 1d4+2); Greatclub (+6 1d8+2); Shortbow (+4 1d6 R80/320); Unarmed (+6 1+2)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +20
Martial Adept: Has the Combat Superiority feature with 2 maneuvers and 1 die
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Damage Adjustment: +2
Combat Superiority: Can use a d6 Superiority Die to perform one of 2 chosen Maneuvers 1 time per short rest
Destroy Undead: Turning destroys undead up to CR 1
Evasive Footwork: Can add a Superiority Die to Armor Class during a move
Maneuvering Attack: Can add a Superiority Die to damage and allow an ally to use a reaction to move half speed with no opportunity attack from the target
Turn Undead: R30' Can use Channel Divinity to make undead flee (DC 13 Wisdom neg) for 1 min
Save Proficiency: Charisma; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 5; Constitution: 2; Dexterity: 0; Intelligence: 4; Strength: 2; Wisdom: 5

Symbol (C7 Abju): Inscribes a touch object with a permanent glyph that, when triggered, inflicts a choice of harmful magic effect—10d10 HP necrotic (save Constitution half), arguing for 1 min (save Constitution neg), frightened and fleeing for 1 min (save Wisdom neg), overwhelmed with despair for 1 min (save Charisma neg), insane for 1 min (save Intelligence neg), incapacitated by pain for 1 min (save Constitution neg), asleep for 10 min or until shaken or harmed (save Wisdom neg), or stunned for 1 min (save Wisdom neg)
Thaumaturgy (C0 Tran): R30' Creates minor magic effects—a booming voice, modification of flames, harmless tremors, an illusory sound, movement of a door or window, or a change in eye appearance—for 1 min
Tongues (C3 Divi): Touched understands any language and is universally understood for 1 hr
True Resurrection (C9 Necr): Restores life and full hit points to and removes all diseases, poisons, wounds, and curses from a willing touched or named 200-year-old corpse
True Seeing (C6 Divi): Touched gains 120' truesight, sees magically concealed doors, and can see into the Ethereal Plane for 1 hr
Wall Of Fire (C4 [Light Domain] Evoc): R120' Creates a 60'x20'x1' wall or a 20'x20'x1' ring that inflicts 5d8 HP fire (save Dexterity half) within 10' of a chosen side for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Warding Bond (C2 Abju): Touched gains +1 AC, +1 saves, and resistance to all damage while within 60' of self, and any damage to the target also affects self, for 1 hr
Water Walk (C3 Tran): R30' 10 targets can traverse liquids for 1 hr [R]
Word Of Recall (C6 Conj): R5' Teleports self and 5 others to a prepared location
Zone Of Truth (C2 Ench): R60' Creatures in a 15' radius cannot lie (save Charisma neg) for 10 min
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Warlock): Knows 2 warlock cantrips/Can cast a chosen K1 spell once per long rest
Bonus Cantrip (Light Domain): Knows the Light cantrip
Divine Intervention: Has a 10% chance to gain help from Norse-Forseti once per week
Improved Flare: R30' Can use Warding Flare to protect another creature
Potent Spellcasting: +1 Cleric cantrip damage
Radiance Of The Dawn: R30' Can use Channel Divinity to dispel magical darkness and to inflict 2d10+10 HP radiant (Constitution half) on foes
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the cleric spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Warding Flare: R30' Can use a reaction to inflict disadvantage on a foe attack once per long rest
Notes
Validation Errors:
Fighter-Evasive Footwork Selectable Feature: Requires fighter level >= 3
Fighter-Maneuvering Attack Selectable Feature: Requires fighter level >= 3
